title: Implement User Registration
description: As a user, I want to register securely, so that I can create a new account for accessing the banking portal.
acceptance_criteria: Given I am on the registration page, When I input valid details and submit, Then my account should be created securely.
test_cases: Given I am on the registration page, When I input valid details and submit, Then my account should be created securely.

title: Validate User Credentials
description: As a user, I want my credentials to be validated, so that I can ensure my login information is correct.
acceptance_criteria: Given I am entering my login details, When I input valid credentials, Then I should be successfully logged in.
test_cases: Given I am entering my login details, When I input valid credentials, Then I should be successfully logged in.

title: Encrypt User Passwords
description: As a user, I want my password to be encrypted, so that my login information remains secure.
acceptance_criteria: Given I have registered an account, When I set a password, Then the password should be encrypted.
test_cases: Given I have registered an account, When I set a password, Then the password should be encrypted.

title: Implement Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA)
description: As a user, I want to set up multi-factor authentication, so that my account has an extra layer of security.
acceptance_criteria: Given I have logged in, When I enable MFA, Then I should receive a verification code through my chosen method (e.g., OTP or biometric).
test_cases: Given I have logged in, When I enable MFA, Then I should receive a verification code through my chosen method (e.g., OTP or biometric).

title: Create Responsive Layouts
description: As a user, I want the portal interface to be responsive, so that I can have an optimal experience on any device.
acceptance_criteria: Given I am accessing the portal on any device, When I navigate through the interface, Then the layout should adjust to fit my screen size.
test_cases: Given I am accessing the portal on any device, When I navigate through the interface, Then the layout should adjust to fit my screen size.

title: Ensure Usability and Accessibility
description: As a user, I want the interface to be user-friendly and accessible, so that I can navigate and complete tasks easily.
acceptance_criteria: Given I am using the portal, When I navigate through various sections, Then I should find the interface easy to use and accessible according to standards.
test_cases: Given I am using the portal, When I navigate through various sections, Then I should find the interface easy to use and accessible according to standards.

title: Develop Personalized Dashboard
description: As a customer, I want a personalized dashboard, so that I can see relevant products and services based on my profile.
acceptance_criteria: Given I am logged in, When I access the dashboard, Then I should see customized banking products and services relevant to my profile.
test_cases: Given I am logged in, When I access the dashboard, Then I should see customized banking products and services relevant to my profile.

epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
title: Implement Account Opening Workflow
description: As a customer, I want a guided workflow for account opening, so that I can easily open a new account.
acceptance_criteria: Given I am initiating an account opening process, When I follow the guided workflow, Then I should be able to open a new account seamlessly.
test_cases: Given I am initiating an account opening process, When I follow the guided workflow, Then I should be able to open a new account seamlessly.

epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
title: Implement Service Modification Workflow
description: As a customer, I want a guided workflow for service modification, so that I can modify existing services easily.
acceptance_criteria: Given I want to modify an existing service, When I follow the guided workflow, Then I should be able to modify the service with minimal effort.
test_cases: Given I want to modify an existing service, When I follow the guided workflow, Then I should be able to modify the service with minimal effort.

title: Allow Saving of Incomplete Applications
description: As a user, I want to save an incomplete application, so that I can resume it later.
acceptance_criteria: Given I am filling out an application, When I save it halfway, Then the application should be stored securely for me to resume later.
test_cases: Given I am filling out an application, When I save it halfway, Then the application should be stored securely for me to resume later.

title: Enable Document Upload
description: As a user, I want to upload documents securely, so that I can provide necessary information for my requests.
acceptance_criteria: Given I need to upload documents, When I submit them through the portal, Then they should be securely uploaded and validated.
test_cases: Given I need to upload documents, When I submit them through the portal, Then they should be securely uploaded and validated.

title: Resume Incomplete Applications
description: As a user, I want to resume an incomplete application, so that I can complete it at my convenience.
acceptance_criteria: Given I have saved an application, When I return to it later, Then I should be able to resume from where I left off.
test_cases: Given I have saved an application, When I return to it later, Then I should be able to resume from where I left off.

title: Enable Real-Time Status Tracking
description: As a customer, I want to track the status of my requests in real-time, so that I am informed about the progress.
acceptance_criteria: Given I have made a request, When I check the status, Then I should be able to see real-time updates on the portal.
test_cases: Given I have made a request, When I check the status, Then I should be able to see real-time updates on the portal.

title: Implement Notification System
description: As a customer, I want to receive notifications about my request status, so that I am alerted to important changes.
acceptance_criteria: Given I have submitted a request, When the status changes, Then I should receive notifications via email or within the portal.
test_cases: Given I have submitted a request, When the status changes, Then I should receive notifications via email or within the portal.

epic_title: Comprehensive Interaction History and Audit Logs
title: Maintain Interaction History
description: As a user, I want a detailed record of my interactions, so that I can review my activity.
acceptance_criteria: Given I have performed actions on the portal, When I review my history, Then I should see detailed records of all my interactions.
test_cases: Given I have performed actions on the portal, When I review my history, Then I should see detailed records of all my interactions.

epic_title: Comprehensive Interaction History and Audit Logs
title: Maintain Audit Logs
description: As an administrator, I want to access audit logs, so that I can ensure compliance and traceability of user actions.
acceptance_criteria: Given I am an administrator, When I review audit logs, Then I should see timestamped records of significant user actions.
test_cases: Given I am an administrator, When I review audit logs, Then I should see timestamped records of significant user actions.
